title: Solak: The Bears are a second-half team, and you can never count them out
content: Perhaps we shouldn't be surprised the Bears came back to beat the Packers. They've been doing this all season.

title: Comeback Bears 'no fluke,' rally from 18 down
content: Chicago quarterback Caleb Williams came through in his playoff debut, throwing a go-ahead, 25-yard touchdown pass to DJ Moore with 1:43 remaining, and the Bears rallied from an 18-point deficit to defeat the Green Bay Packers 31-27 in the wild-card round.

title: Sources: Bregman to Cubs on 5-year, $175M deal
content: Third baseman Alex Bregman and the Chicago Cubs agreed to a five-year, $175 million contract Saturday, sources told ESPN.

title: Deflated LaFleur deflects job talk after Pack loss
content: Deflated after his team's stunning 31-27 loss to the Chicago Bears on Saturday night, Green Bay coach Matt LaFleur told reporters that he wants to remain Packers coach, but he declined to say whether he expected to return next season for an eighth year.

title: C's Brown rips refs after loss: 'I'll take the fine'
content: Celtics star Jaylen Brown was furious with the officiating in his team's 100-95 loss to the Spurs, saying he's tired of not getting the same calls as the opponent.

title: Stafford shows 'MVP stuff' in Rams' clinching drive
content: Matthew Stafford led the Rams to a 34-31 victory over the Panthers on Saturday with a seven-play, 71-yard drive that ended with a touchdown pass to tight end Colby Parkinson.

title: Harbaugh to limit interviews to just a few teams
content: Former Ravens coach John Harbaugh will narrow his options to just a few NFL teams before starting to take interviews for his next potential job, he told Fox Sports.

title: Sources: Yankees, Bellinger talks at an impasse
content: Contract negotiations between the New York Yankees and Cody Bellinger are at an impasse, league sources tell ESPN.

title: Schroder suspended for trying to strike Doncic
content: Kings point guard Dennis Schroder was suspended three games by the NBA for confronting and attempting to hit Luka Doncic after a loss to the Lakers on Dec. 28.

title: ðŸ‘€ Offseason guide for all eliminated NFL teams
content: The NFL offseason has arrived for 20 teams. What must each do to have a better season in 2026? We have outlooks, early buzz and predictions.

title: Two overreactions, two big questions: Graziano and Solak make sense of Saturday's wild-card comebacks
content: Is Caleb Williams a future MVP? Do the Rams have secondary problems? We're making sense of each game in the NFL playoffs wild-card round.

title: Our guide to four remaining wild-card games: Matchup previews, bold predictions, more
content: Bills-Jaguars? Niners-Eagles? Chargers-Pats? Texans-Steelers? We have picks, predictions and stats to know.

title: FA Cup biggest shock ever: Macclesfield stun holders Palace
content: In a competition known for shocking results, the FA Cup produced its biggest Saturday in its 154-year history.

title: 'Not sure why they felt the need': NBA execs on the Trae deal and trade season's next move
content: Tim Bontemps and Brian Windhorst survey the league on the Young deal and what comes next for the Wizards and Hawks.

title: Men's: A weak nonconference slate could doom Georgia
content: The Bulldogs are a few SEC losses away from the wrong side of the bubble due to a number of low-quality wins.

title: Women's: Why LSU's seed could be determined in the next two games
content: LSU has work to do after its 0-2 start in SEC play, but opportunity arrives with the season's most crucial two-game stretch.

title: Inside Washington's quiet collapse in 2025 and the decisions defining its offseason
content: Parting ways with Kliff Kingsbury was a bold move that raised the stakes for Dan Quinn & Co. this offseason.

title: From future HOF pitchers to a veteran catcher: Best fits for under-the-radar MLB free agents
content: Did your favorite team miss out on the biggest stars of this winter? Here are 15 players to sign instead.

title: Power Rankings: Where every team stands in the new year
content: Though there are still free agents to be signed, let's reassess the standings midway through the offseason.

title: Supercopa Clasico preview, predictions: Are Barcelona favorites vs. Real Madrid?
content: Barcelona and Real Madrid meet in the Supercopa final on Sunday, but who has the upper hand? Sam Marsden and Alex Kirkland preview the upcoming Clasico.

title: WNBA, WNBPA fail to reach new CBA at deadline
content: The WNBA and its players' union failed to agree to a new collective bargaining agreement or an extension of the previous one by Friday's 11:59 p.m. ET deadline.

title: 'We're all using it as motivation': LSU aims to shake off last season and win again
content: Last year, the defending champion Tigers were edged out of finals. Now they're back -- with a plan to win the national title again.

title: Jaguars' all teal, Panthers' all black lead NFL wild-card weekend uniforms
content: The NFL's wild-card round kicks off Saturday with multiple teams opting for traditional uniform combinations.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Bruno Fernandes linked with Man United exit
content: Bruno Fernandes reportedly wants out at Manchester United this summer and Bernardo Silva is in talks with Galatasaray. Transfer Talk has the latest.

title: NFL wild-card round: Expect a tight game between 49ers and Eagles
content: Odds, game picks, prop plays, betting advice and daily fantasy tips for the 49ers-Eagles wild-card matchup.

title: The 2026 championship parlays: From conservative plays to huge potential payouts
content: We go on record picking this year's champions, beginning with the CFP and ending with the World Series.

title: Drama at sacked IAS Puja Khedkarâ€™s home: Family allegedly tied up, drugged & robbed â€” how it unfolded
content: Pune police are investigating claims by former IAS probationer Puja Khedkar. She alleges a recently hired domestic help from Nepal drugged her and her parents, tied them up, and stole valuables and mobile phones from their Baner Road residence. Khedkar managed to free herself and alert authorities.

title: â€˜Journey from 20% to 30% & 40% wonâ€™t be that longâ€™: Shah says BJP vote share rising in Kerala
content: Union home minister Amit Shah expressed confidence in the BJP's growing support in Kerala, predicting a victory in the upcoming Assembly elections. He highlighted the party's increasing vote share and recent local body successes, attributing them to dedicated workers.

title: â€˜Misleading narrativeâ€™: Chirag jibes oppn over G RAM G protest, calls it â€˜helpâ€™ in Bengal polls
content: Union minister Chirag Paswan accused the Congress and RJD of spreading a misleading narrative around government schemes like VB-G RAM G, claiming their protests would electorally benefit the NDA. Paswan defended the new scheme, emphasizing collective responsibility and improved focus on infrastructure projects, while criticizing the Congress for alleged corruption in MGNREGA.

title: Microsoft AI CEO: We're building superintelligence backwards; need controls before trust
content: Microsoft AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman urges the industry to prioritize containment over alignment in AI development, warning against pursuing superintelligence without first ensuring control. He advocates for a "Humanist Superintelligence" approach, focusing on practical applications like medical AI and clean energy, to maintain human oversight and avoid uncontrolled autonomous systems.

title: Bangladeshi umpire officiates IND vs NZ ODI amid Mustafizur row â€” who is he?
content: As per ICC regulations, umpires for ODIs are appointed under specific clauses. Clause 2.1.4 states that the ICC shall appoint one umpire for each ODI, who must not be from the same country as the participating teams and must be from the Elite Panel or International Panel. Clause 2.1.5 says the home board shall appoint one umpire.

title: BJP protest in Hyderabad: Man beaten for desecrating temple; arrested
content: A 26-year-old man from Karnataka was arrested in Hyderabad for allegedly entering a temple and committing indecent acts. Police registered a case under the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita for unlawful entry and insulting religious beliefs. The incident sparked protests from Hindu groups, with the BJP president calling for strict action and accusing the ruling party of appeasement.

title: Gmail just fulfilled 'my personal wish' by ... : Google AI CEO Demis Hassabis
content: Google has integrated its Gemini 3 AI model into Gmail, introducing features like AI Overviews for email summaries and AI-powered inbox organization. CEO Sundar Pichai announced the update, highlighting AI's role in streamlining communication. Google AI CEO Demis Hassabis expressed excitement, calling it a "fantastic example of how AI can be helpful in everyday life."

title: IND vs NZ: 'Where is Arshdeep?' â€” Memes flood internet after pacer dropped
content: India faced New Zealand in the first ODI at Vadodara, but team selection stole the spotlight. Arshdeep Singhâ€™s absence from the playing XI surprised fans and sparked memes online, with Mohammed Siraj returning instead. Meanwhile, Shreyas Iyer made his comeback after injury, strengthening Indiaâ€™s batting. Shubman Gill chose to bowl first, aiming to test combinations in helpful conditions.

title: Somaliland row: Somalia accuses Israel of planning Palestinian relocation; Tel Aviv denies
content: Somalia's defence minister claims Israel plans to move Palestinians to Somaliland. He calls this a violation of international law. Israel and Somaliland deny these allegations. Somalia's president previously stated Somaliland accepted Israeli conditions. The issue has drawn regional attention and condemnation from the OIC.

title: Nupur Sanon-Stebin Ben drop pics from their Christian wedding
content: In a picturesque celebration held in the enchanting city of Udaipur, Nupur Sanon, the sister of beloved actress Kriti Sanon, has officially embarked on her journey of love by marrying her longtime partner, Stebin Ben. The charming couple celebrated in a beautiful Christian wedding, donning elegant white ensembles that radiated joy.

title: â€˜Legitimate targetsâ€™: Iran warns US of retaliation; Israel on high alert â€” will Trump order a strike?
content: Iran's leadership faces escalating protests, now in their third week, with over 116 reported deaths. Amidst this unrest, Israel is on high alert as US President Trump reportedly considers military action. Iran has issued a stern warning, deeming regional US bases and Israel as 'legitimate targets' if attacked.

title: â€˜From Ghazni to Aurangzebâ€™: PM Modi invokes Somnath's history; hails templeâ€™s resilience
content: Addressing a gathering during the Somnath Swabhiman Parv, PM Modi said: "Those present here, your ancestors, our ancestors, bet their lives for their faith, for their belief, for Mahadev - they sacrificed everything they had". Without taking names, PM Modi attacked the Congress-led government for "whitewashing the history" that encapsulates the multiple attacks by Mughal invaders on the Somnath temple.

title: MLB trade rumours: Pirates eye $66mn ex-Reds star to boost rotation
content: Pittsburgh Pirates are actively seeking a power boost for their lineup, eyeing free agent Eugenio SuÃ¡rez.  The team, which struggled with home runs in 2025, sees SuÃ¡rez as a direct solution.  A potential sign-and-trade with Seattle is also being explored, offering a win-win scenario for both clubs and SuÃ¡rez himself.

title: Watch: NSUI protests against VB-GRAMG scheme in UP; security tightened in Varanasi, Lucknow
content: The National Students' Union of India (NSUI) protested the VB-GRAMG scheme across Uttar Pradesh, including Lucknow and Varanasi, on Sunday. Demonstrations in Lucknow saw workers detained by security. In Varanasi, heightened security surrounded Prime Minister Modi's public outreach office ahead of a planned "Save MGNREGA" march, with police and paramilitary forces on alert.

title: When disasters strike, preparation saves lives â€” is India ready when crisis hits?
content: India faces escalating disaster risks due to geography, climate change, and development patterns, as starkly illustrated in 2025 by devastating floods and heatwaves. While response capacity has improved, a persistent imbalance favors reactive relief over proactive preparedness, a gap highlighted by contrasting events like Cyclone Phailin and Bihar's recurring floods.

title: Not Bumrah â€” Sanjay Manjrekar names this bowler as 'find' of Indian cricket
content: Former cricketer Sanjay Manjrekar lauded Harshit Rana as a significant find for India's bowling attack, highlighting his versatility across all game phases. Manjrekar noted Rana's effectiveness with the new ball and his T20 skills in later spells, bolstering India's middle-overs wicket-taking ability.

title: Mary Kom reveals why she divorced Onler Kom after over 20 yrs of marriage
content: Boxing legend MC Mary Kom reveals a devastating personal crisis following her divorce from husband Onler Kom. She faced financial ruin, property loss, and public slander, questioning her life's achievements. Despite betrayal, Mary is determined to focus on her children and rebuild her life, drawing strength from her family.

title: â€˜Ignored signals, sudden U-turn, gunfightâ€™: How cops nabbed Noida lift chain snatcher
content: A man accused of attempting to snatch a gold chain from a senior citizen in Greater Noida West was apprehended following a brief gunfight. The suspect, Rahul Yadav, was intercepted during a late-night vehicle check. He allegedly opened fire when signaled to stop, prompting police to return fire and injure him. A pistol and stolen motorcycle were recovered.

title: Aleppo clashes: Syrian govt takes control of Sheikh Maqsoud; detains 300 Kurds
content: Syrian government forces have taken full control of Aleppo after securing Sheikh Maqsoud, the city's last opposition-held district. This development followed intense fighting and the evacuation of hundreds of Kurdish fighters. The government also detained around 300 Kurds, including security personnel, as operations concluded.

title: A 72-hour workweek sounds heroic until you try it: This professional's story tells you why
content: Infosys co-founder Narayana Murthy's call for a 72-hour workweek faced a viral rebuttal on Reddit. A professional's account of improved productivity and well-being after switching to a five-day week challenged the notion that longer hours equate to greater output. This highlights a generational divide in Indian work culture, questioning endurance over efficiency.

title: Another milestone! Virat Kohli goes past Sourav Ganguly
content: Virat Kohli has achieved another milestone, becoming the fifth Indian with the most ODI appearances, surpassing Sourav Ganguly.  With 309 matches played, he now trails only Tendulkar, Dhoni, Dravid, and Azharuddin.  Kohli is also nearing a significant batting record, poised to become the second-highest international run-scorer across all formats.

title: Actor-singer, Indian Idol Season 3 winner Prashant Tamang passes away at 43
content: Popular singer Prashant Tamang, winner of Indian Idol Season 3 and formerly associated with Kolkata Police, has passed away at 43. Hailing from the Darjeeling hills, Tamang was a nationally recognized artist, with West Bengal CM Mamata Banerjee expressing deep sorrow over his untimely demise.

title: â€˜A tubelight in his mindâ€™: Owaisi hits back at Himanta over â€˜only Hindu PMâ€™ remark
content: AIMIM chief Asaduddin Owaisi slammed Assam CM Himanta Biswa Sarma's remark that only a Hindu can be PM, calling it a "Pakistan-like mindset." Owaisi asserted India's Constitution allows any citizen to hold the top post, envisioning a future hijab-clad PM. Political leaders across parties criticized Owaisi's comments, with some accusing him of appeasement.

title: MP: â€˜Gau mutra, gobar cancer projectâ€™ funds splurged on cars, travel; probe unearths multi-crore scam
content: Instead of combating cancer with cow products, including milk, under the Panchgavya research project, the funds were allegedly splurged on cars, air travel and overpriced machines, an investigation has found. The probe was ordered by Jabalpur district collector Raghvendra Singh, who constituted a two-member committee led by additional collector R S Marawi, following complaints of misuse of the research funds.

title: Vanessa Bryant thanks fans for braving rain at emotional Mamba book signing
content: Vanessa Bryant recently hosted a 'Mamba & Mambacita Forever' book signing, drawing large crowds despite rain. The event celebrated Kobe and Gianna Bryant's enduring legacy through art and community. Fans shared personal stories, highlighting how Vanessa's foundation continues to inspire and provide sports opportunities for underserved youth, honoring her family's memory.

title: 'Blue, green, red': Ravindra Jadeja undergoes unique training session â€” Watch
content: Ravindra Jadeja is honing his bowling skills with a unique drill ahead of India's ODI series against New Zealand. Guided by coach Morne Morkel, Jadeja practiced precise ball placement, aiming for coloured cones. The all-rounder is in excellent form, boasting a strong ODI record against the Black Caps, making him a key player for the upcoming matches.

title: Ayesha Curry promotes Jamaican tourism after devastating hurricane
content: Ayesha Curry is urging fans to support Jamaica's recovery from Hurricane Melissa by visiting the island. She highlighted that tourism is crucial for the Jamaican economy, with nearly 30% of the workforce dependent on it. Curry emphasized that a vacation serves as a donation, with airports and most hotels now operational.

title: Delhi horror: Woman, witness to husband's murder in 2023, shot dead; killed exact same way
content: In a chilling echo of her husband's murder, a woman was shot dead in Delhi, less than three years after he was killed in a personal rivalry. Police suspect one of the bike-borne assailants was also involved in the husband's murder, as the victim was a key witness.

title: 'The Raja Saab' day 3 vs 'Dhurandhar': Prabhas starrer dominates
content: In a thrilling box office showdown, Ranveer Singh's action-packed spy film 'Dhurandhar' has continued its triumphant ascent, amassing over Rs 1200 crore globally, even as it faces competition from new releases. At the same time, Prabhas has made a splash with his horror-comedy venture 'The Raja Saab,' which has seen promising first-week collections that could challenge 'Dhurandhar's' recent success.

title: Shubman Gill makes bold call at toss - WATCH
content: India won the toss and elected to bowl first against New Zealand in the opening ODI, with Rishabh Pant ruled out due to injury and Dhruv Jurel replacing him. Captain Shubman Gill explained the decision was to assess bowling combinations and dew conditions.

title: 'Mini VK'! Virat Kohli meets his childhood lookalike; fans go wild â€” watch
content: Virat Kohli's preparation for the ODI series against New Zealand in Vadodara was marked by intense net sessions and a heartwarming fan interaction. A young fan's striking resemblance to a younger Kohli drew widespread amusement online, with many dubbing him 'Mini VK'. Kohli continues his impressive ODI form, aiming to maintain momentum against the Blackcaps.

title: Who is Reza Pahlavi? Iranâ€™s exiled crown prince urges protesters not to â€˜abandon the streetsâ€™
content: Widespread anti-government protests in Iran have entered their second week, escalating from economic grievances to calls for political change. Exiled crown prince Reza Pahlavi has re-emerged, urging protesters to remain on the streets and advocating for a secular, democratic transition.

title: Taylor Swift reportedly uneasy about combining finances with Travis Kelce
content: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce have been together for more than two years now and have inspired billions of fans with the love and commitment they have shown towards each other. As the two plan their lavish wedding, it seems Taylor Swift is very focused on signing a strong prenup that is all set to protect all her assets and wealth.

title: Damroo in hand, 108 horses in procession: PM takes part in â€˜Shaurya Yatraâ€™ at Somnath
content: â€‹â€‹Visuals from the event showed the Prime Minister standing in an open, flower-adorned vehicle as the procession moved through the town. He was joined by Gujarat chief minister Bhupendra Patel and deputy chief minister Harsh Sanghavi. During the yatra, the Prime Minister was seen blowing a conch shell and greeting crowds that had gathered along the route.

title: â€˜Undoubtedly a ratnaâ€™:RJD takes jibe at Nitish Kumar amid Bharat Ratna push; questions merit
content: Amidst calls for Nitish Kumar to receive the Bharat Ratna, RJD MP Sudhakar Singh acknowledged his long service as Bihar CM, even while unwell, as a testament to his worthiness. Union Minister Jitan Ram Manjhi and JD(U) leader KC Tyagi also championed the Bihar chief minister for the nation's highest civilian honour, citing his 'exemplary governance' and socialist credentials.

title: When silence isnâ€™t golden: Gynaecologist shares why cervical health needs attention
content: Cervical health often goes undiscussed due to embarrassment and fear, yet proactive care is vital. Many conditions, including pre-cancerous lesions and HPV, develop silently. Neglecting the cervix can impact fertility and the entire reproductive system. January is Cervical Cancer Awareness Month, urging women to prioritize check-ups for early detection and prevention.

title: Udaipur Leela Palace fined Rs 10 lakh: Staff entered occupied room with master key
content: A Chennai consumer court has ordered The Leela Palace, Udaipur, to pay over Rs 10.65 lakh in compensation and refund. The luxury hotel was found guilty of deficiency in service after a housekeeping staff member unlawfully entered an occupied room using a master key, causing severe mental trauma to a pregnant guest.

title: What happened to Rishabh Pant? A blow-by-blow account
content: Rishabh Pant has been ruled out of the upcoming ODI series against New Zealand due to a side strain sustained during training. The wicketkeeper-batter suffered an oblique muscle tear after being hit by a delivery. This setback comes after his return from a toe fracture. Dhruv Jurel has been named as Pantâ€™s replacement.

title: Is Caleb Williams dating Ash Kaashh? Bears vs Packers post fuels buzz
content: Chicago Bears quarterback Caleb Williams' personal life, particularly his rumored girlfriend, has become a subject of intense fan speculation. Model and influencer Ash Kaashh has fueled these rumors with social media posts, though Williams has not confirmed any relationship. His past relationship with Alina Thyregod is also mentioned, but he currently maintains a private personal life.

title: Obscene images row: â€˜Xâ€™ admits â€˜mistakeâ€™; thousands of posts, over 600 accounts taken down
content: The Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY) had raised concerns over obscene and harmful content allegedly generated by Elon Muskâ€™s chatbot Grok. The ministry sent a letter to X (formerly Twitter), the social media website owned by Elon Musk, pointing out failures in moderating AI-generated content on its platform.

title: OnBoard technology helps visually impaired passengers identify KSRTC buses in Mysuru
content: OnBoard is a patented radio-frequency (RF) based technology developed at IIT Delhi specifically to help visually impaired individuals identify and board buses.

title: Personal interests not grounds for opposing new infrastructure: CJI on Gauhati High Court Bar Associationâ€™s stir
content: The Gauhati High Court Bar Association has been opposing the relocation of the High Court complex to the northern bank of the Brahmaputra river from the heart of Guwahati city

title: Amit Shah unveils BJPâ€™s three-point poll agenda in Kerala, demands investigation by neutral agency into Sabarimala gold theft
content: Victory in local body elections in Kerala, especially at the Thiruvananthapuram Corporation, is the first step towards its ultimate aim of forming a government in the State, says Shah

title: Congress to contest 2027 Punjab polls under joint party leadership: Bhupesh Baghel
content: Addressing a press conference in Bathinda, Mr. Baghel said all senior leaders of the party are chief ministerial faces

title: Fit Mysuru walkathon witnesses large turnout
content: The response for the walkathon was more than the expected 10,000, said a statement from the organisers, pointing out that about 7,000 to 8,000 had registered for the event in advance.

title: NRK womanâ€™s complaint to CMO and sworn video statement led to Mamkootathilâ€™s midnight arrest
content: The FIR stated that the victim also preserved the dress she wore at the time of sexual assault. The police have moved the court to impound the dress as evidence for forensic examination.

title: Rahul Mamkootathil sexual assault case: What we know so far
content: Former Congress MLA Rahul Mamkootathilâ€™s rapid fall from grace highlights a troubling pattern of allegations, culminating in his recent arrest amid escalating accusations of sexual misconduct and violence

title: Centre proposes smartphone makers to give source code in security overhaul
content: The plan is part of Prime Minister Narendra Modi's efforts to boost the security of user data as online fraud and data breaches increase in the world's second-largest smartphone market, with nearly 750 million phones

title: Magistrate remands Rahul Mamkootathil to 14-day judicial custody
content: The magistrate sent him to a sub-jail in Mavelikkara for 14 days. The Crime Branch had produced him before the magistrate holding temporary charge

title: After water contamination tragedy, Madhya Pradesh CM orders safe supply for all
content: Congress has sought the resignation of MP Urban Development Minister Kailash Vijayvargiya in whose constituency the tragedy took place

title: Mumbai civic polls: Mahayuti releases manifesto, promises 50% bus concession for women alongside new benefits
content: MahayutiÂ also targets GenZ through its manifesto, providing internship programmes, Mumbai Digital Sakhi to train women in AI and coding courses and use AI technology to deport Bangladeshis

title: Amit Shah seeks probe by neutral agency in Sabarimala gold theft case
content: The BJP will carry out protests and door-to-door awareness campaigns. This is democracy, Vijayan, and you must order a neutral agency probe, says Union Home Minister Amit Shah

title: Puja Khedkar alleges house help sedated family, stole valuables; probe launched
content: â€œShe claimed a house help hailing from Nepal, administered sedatives to her and her parents, Dilip and Manorama Khedkar, rendered them unconscious, tied them up, and decamped with their mobile phones and some valuables,â€ says police

title: All India Cashew Association voices concern over surge in illegal import of the dry fruit
content: The domestic market is now being flooded with cashew kernels from Vietnam and African countries and Special Economic Zones (SEZ) are also being misused to channel such imports

title: Seal Ennore ammonia terminal and pipeline, insists a PIL before Madras High Court
content: Chief Justice Manindra Mohan Shrivastava and Justice G. Arul Murugan are slated to hear the case on Monday

title: MHA seeks report on alleged attack on Suvendu Adhikari's convoy
content: The protesters demanded the immediate arrest of those involved, alleging a conspiracy to kill the BJP leader by setting his vehicle on fire

title: Karnataka hate speech Bill not returned, Governor has neither rejected nor approved it: Siddaramaiah
content: The Karnataka CM also questioned the BJPâ€™s move to take out a padayatra from Ballari to Bengaluru on January 17, to condemn the clashes over banner that killed one.

title: Forces that opposed Somnath temple reconstruction still active, need to defeat them: PM Modi
content: The history of Somnath is not that of destruction and defeat but of victory and renewal. This is the cycle of time that fundamentalist invaders are now reduced to pages of history, but the Somnath temple still stands tall, says Prime Minister Narendra Modi

title: ED moves Supreme Court in I-PAC case, seeks fair probe into State â€˜obstructionâ€™ of its raids
content: West Bengal has already filed a caveat in the Supreme Court to ensure that no ex-parte orders, possibly granting relief to the ED, are passed without hearing it first

title: Kamal Haasan moves Madras High Court to protect his personality rights
content: The lawsuit says no one should be allowed to exploit Haasanâ€™s name, initials, images for commercial or personal gain without his express consent

title: Sanjay Raut slams BJPâ€™s Annamalai for saying Mumbai is not Maharashtra city
content: You should file a case against him here. How can he talk like this about Maharashtra's capital? The CM should file a case against him and arrest him. He should not be allowed to leave Mumbai, says Shiv Sena (UBT) MP Sanjay Raut

title: Kerala Assembly Speakerâ€™s office seeks legal opinion on disqualifying Palakkad MLA Rahul Mamkootathil
content: Speaker A.N. Shamsheer said his office would seek legal opinion on whether the House could disqualify him from membership under the provisions of the Anti-Defection Law

title: Ghettoisation against Marathis in Mumbai due to BJP: Aaditya Thackeray
content: Aaditya Thackeray also hit out at the BJP for pegging its campaign around the issue of Bangladeshi infiltrators and said it is â€œworking on Ravanaâ€™s footprints on the land of Lord Ram in Tapovanâ€

title: Elderly couple kept under â€˜digital arrestâ€™ for over two weeks in Delhi; duped of â‚¹14 crore
content: The fraud came to light after the calls stopped on January 9, prompting the couple to approach the authorities

title: AAIB team begins probe into small aircraft crash landing near Rourkela
content: The health condition of all six people, including two women and two pilots injured in the crash landing of an aircraft in Rourkela, was â€œsafe and stableâ€

title: Delhi Police arrest two more in Turkman Gate violence case; 18 held so far
content: Drone surveillance and extensive CCTV monitoring are being carried out to keep a close watch on the area. The situation is peaceful and under control, a police officer said.

title: Former MLA, Thackeray loyalist Dagdu Sakpal, joins Shinde's Sena ahead of Mumbai Civic Polls
content: Sakpal had served as an MLA multiple times from Mumbaiâ€™s Lalbaug-Parel-Sewree belt, the stronghold of the Thackerays for more than five decades

title: Woman shot dead in Delhi; police probe link to husbandâ€™s 2023 murder
content: Police said Rachna was originally from Bhalswa village in north-west Delhi. Investigators suspect that the murder is linked to the killing of her husband, Vijendra Yadav, who was shot dead in 2023.

title: Meerut murder-abduction case: Accused nabbed in Haridwar; woman rescued
content: The incident happened in Kapsad village of Meerut on January 8, when a woman was grievously injured while trying to save her 22-year-old daughter from alleged abductors, triggering caste tension

title: T.N. Information Commission raps petitioner for abusing RTI ActÂ with excessive requests
content: Imposes penalty of â‚¹10,000 for using the Act as a tool to intimidate public authorities. The petitioner had filed 781 RTI petitions before the Principal District Judge, Theni.

title: Gauhati HC Bar Association sits on hunger strike, to boycott CJI's function for new complex
content: A new complex of the Gauhati High Court has been proposed as part of a judicial township at Rangmahal in North Guwahati and CJI, Justice Surya Kant, is scheduled to lay the foundation stone of it later in the day

title: Fog reduces visibility in parts of Punjab, Haryana
content: Bathinda was the coldest place in Punjab recording a minimum temperature of 1.6 degrees Celsius while Hisar, at a low of 2.2 degrees Celsius, was the coldest place in Haryana, according to the weather office

title: At least three killed, one injured as motorcycles collide head-on in Etah
content: Due to reduced visibility caused by dense fog, the drivers lost control near the turn, resulting in a head-on collision

title: Question paper row: Chhattisgarh school headmistress suspended, moderator faces dismissal
content: An English paper for Class IV exam included the question , "What is the name of Mona's dog?" with four options, with one of the options listed the name 'Ram'

title: Migration from Srikakulam, Vizianagaram to cities will decrease after Bhogapuram Airport construction: MP
content: â€œI have been receiving many petitions from youngsters for jobs during Praja Darbars being conducted in different places of Vizianagaram Assembly Constituency. Their dreams will become a reality very soon as all developmental activities are set to take off in the year 2026 itself,â€ says Vizianagaram Parliament Member

title: Air quality a nationwide crisis, government response exceedingly ineffective: Congress
content: A new analysis by the Centre for Research on Energy and Clean Air (CREA) has now confirmed what was always India's "worst-kept secret that the air quality is a nation-wide, structural crisis for which the government response is exceedingly ineffective and inadequate", Congress leader Jairam Ramesh said

title: Crude glycerin leakage from container hits traffic in Thane for over two hours
content: â€œContainer truck carrying 25 tonnes of crude glycerin belonging to a private company was travelling from Ambernath in the district to Gujarat when the liquid began leaking from it and spilled onto the road surface,â€ says Thane disaster management cell chief

title: Kashmir in grip of cold wave, Shopian coldest place at minus 8.6 degrees Celsius
content: Kashmir is currently in the midst of 'Chilla-i-Kalan', 40 days of extreme cold, during which night temperatures often drop several degrees below the freezing point, and the chances of snowfall are the highest

title: Two militants held in connection with recent firing incidents in Manipur
content: â€œThe two members of the proscribed KCP (Noyon) were apprehended on January 10 from Sagolband and Phumlou areas in the district,â€ says a senior officer

title: Months-long under-the-radar investigation paved the way for Mamkootathilâ€™s arrest
content: Officials said a third â€œme-tooâ€ disclosure, received by Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayanâ€™s office last year and processed secretly by the police over the past few months, helped investigators legally circumvent the interim protection from arrest Mr Mamkootathil had obtained from the High Court in two earlier rape and coerced termination of pregnancy cases.Â

title: PM Modi leads Shaurya yatra; dazzling lights, drone, devotion pull massive crowd to Somnath
content: Thousands of devotees thronged the Somnath temple complex on January 10, 2026, staying out well past midnight braving winter chills

title: Retouched Images Of Netanyahu's Wife Ignite A Fiery Ethics Debate
content: In snapshots, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu is joined by his wife, Sara, as well as US Ambassador Mike Huckabee and a group of Israeli soldiers, as they light Hannukah candles.

title: Help "Sedated, Tied Up" Puja Khedkar And Her Family, "Stole" Valuables In Pune
content: The Pune police have launched a probe into former IAS probationer Puja Khedkar's allegations that a house help had rendered her and her parents unconscious and committed theft at their residence, an official said on Sunday.

title: Woman Slapped, Abused By Man On Busy Andhra Road, None Came To Her Rescue
content: A woman in Andhra Pradesh's Visakhapatnam district took to social media on Sunday to describe an incident where she was slapped and abused by an unknown man while commuting to her workplace.

title: Adani Group To Invest Rs 1.5 Lakh Crore In Kutch Over 5 Years: Karan Adani
content: The Adani Group will invest Rs 1.5 lakh crore in Gujarat's Kutch region over the next five years, underlining its long-term commitment to the state, Adani Ports and SEZ Limited Managing Director Karan Adani said on Sunday.

title: Confronting Protests, Iran Vows To Strike Back If US Attacks
content: Tehran threatened to retaliate against Israel and US military bases in the event of U.S. strikes on Iran, issuing the warning as Israeli sources said Israel was on high alert for the possibility of any US intervention.

title: Ex-King Voices Concern Over State Of Nepal After Protests
content: Nepal's former king Gyanendra Shah has expressed concern over the state of the country four months after a youth-led uprising toppled the previous government.

title: 'Not 1, Not 1,000...': Masood Azhar's Chilling Suicide Bombers Warning
content: An audio recording allegedly featuring Masood Azhar, the chief of the banned terror group Jaish-e-Mohammed (JeM), has surfaced, where he claims that a large number of suicide attackers are prepared to strike at any moment.

title: "Have Trust In India": Piyush Goyal Exclusive On US Trade Deal
content: Piyush Goyal urged for trust in India, a day after the Ministry of External Affairs firmly rejected speculation that the India-US trade agreement failed to materialise because Prime Minister Narendra Modi did not place a phone call to Trump.

title: Interest-Free Loans For Women, Homes For BMC Cleaners In Mahayuti Manifesto
content: The ruling Mahayuti alliance in Maharashtra on Sunday released its manifesto for the upcoming Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation (BMC) elections.

title: Paddy Heist Blamed On Rats, Birds Points To Bigger Scam In Chhattisgarh
content: Chhattisgarh, proudly known as the "rice bowl of India", is seeing a crisis. Paddy in the state is now vanishing at the speed of a truck every hour. Officially, it is being eaten by rats, pecked away by birds.

title: 2 Men Arrested For Kidnapping, Sexually Assaulting Woman In Karnataka
content: Police in Karnataka's Hubballi arrested two men for kidnapping a woman, sexually assaulting her, and filming the act, while another man was arrested for circulating the obscene visuals on WhatsApp. The incident occurred on Friday.

title: In D Fadnavis's Assurance To Gen Z, A Mumbai Action Plan For Next 5 Years
content: We want to pledge Rs 17,000 crore towards climate action, Maharashtra Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis said at NDTV's Power Play.

title: Easier To Handle Eknath Shinde Or Uddhav Thackeray? What D Fadnavis Said
content: Comparing his experience of working with Uddhav Thackeray and his lieutenant-turned-rival Eknath Shinde, Maharashtra Chief Minister and BJP leader Devendra Fadnavis has said it is easy to handle Shinde, but quite difficult to work with Thackeray.

title: Bodies Piling Up, Morgues Full: Iran's Hospitals Under Pressure Amid Protests
content: Hospitals across Iran are struggling to cope with a surge of patients as large-scale anti-government protests continue to spread nationwide.

title: Barred From Church, Enrolled At Bar: Sister Lucy Becomes Lawyer At 60
content: At the age of 60, Sister Lucy Kalapura has enrolled as a lawyer with the Kerala High Court Bar Council, marking a new chapter in her long public struggle.

title: They Want To Demolish Us: Suvendu Adhikari Accuses Trinamool Of Convoy Attack
content: West Bengal Leader of Opposition Suvendu Adhikari sat on a protest inside the Chandrakona police station, demanding registration of an FIR after he alleged that his convoy was attacked by Trinamool Congress workers at Paschim Medinipur on Saturday.

title: On Somnath Swabhiman Parv, PM Modi Slams 'People With Colonial Mindset'
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Sunday hit out at "people with a colonial mindset" in post-Independence historical narratives attempting to "erase history" of India's glorious past.

title: Vijay To Appear Before Probe Agency In Karur Stampede Case Tomorrow
content: Tamilaga Vettri Kazhagam president Vijay is set to appear before the Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) in New Delhi on Monday in connection with the probe into the Karur campaign stampede that claimed 41 lives last year, party sources said.

title: Maharashtra To Get AI Tool To Identify Bangladeshi Immigrants: D Fadnavis
content: Maharashtra Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis said an Artificial Intelligence tool is being developed that will be able to identify illegal Bangladeshi and Rohingya immigrants in the state.

title: Biting cold grips Delhi as minimum temperature dips below 4.1Â°C at isolated places
content: Delhiâ€™s Air Quality Index (AQI) stood at 295, in the â€œpoorâ€ category, at 9 a.m., the Central Pollution Control Board (CPCB) data showed.

title: In Frames: Kathputli â€” pulling strings in Jaipurâ€™s puppet colony
content: In this Jaipur corner, nearly 250 families carry forward one of Rajasthanâ€™s oldest folk art forms, Kathputli; these artisans sew bright costumes onto small wooden puppets that are used by travelling performers who narrate tales of Rajput kings, warriors, folk heroes, and moral stories

title: Expelled Congress MLA Rahul Mamkootathil arrested from hotel room in Palakkad in sexual assault case

title: January weather system to influence heavy rainfall in parts of coastal districts on Sunday
content: Coastal places like Chennai experienced nippy weather, strong surface winds interspersed with light rainfall on Saturday owing to the wind influence that brought moisture from Bay of Bengal

title: Karnataka government to submit proposal to NMC for new medical colleges in Ramanagara and Bagalkot
content: The medical colleges for Ramanagara and Kanakapura have remained as a pipedream for the last three years because of the lack of necessary infrastructure, including teaching and non-teaching recruitment. The NMC had denied permission to start the colleges in 2023-24 and 2024-2025.
